column4: Hello. In Karmic, the fast-user-switch-applet was removed. What replaced it? There is nothing on the panels to log me out, switch to a guest user session, etc
It's all there for me.  You just choose logout, and the dialogue includes switcvh user.
The indicator applet session doesn't get added on upgrade, apparently
I didn't use it anyway.  If there's no applet, the "System" menu takes teh job on.
